Using Alexander Street Press Music Audio Resources

How to search and browse in ASP's audio resources. Including: Music Online, American Song, Classical Music Library, Contemporary World Music, Jazz Music Library, and Smithsonian Global Sound.

A Basic Searching Tip for ASP

When you are searching most of the Alexander Street Press databases, it is a good idea to keep you search terms as general as possible!

Alexander Street Press Links

Music Online, American Song, Classical Music Library, Contemporary World Music, Jazz Music Library, Smithsonian Global Sound,

Finding Databases

Contents: Research Port, Browse Database, Browse Music, Search by Vendor, Audio Resources

Research Port

All of these databases are available through Research Port, which is accessible from the library home page.

Just go to lib.umd.edu, and then click on "Research Port"

Back to top

Browse by Database

You can then search the "by database name" option to find the database of your choice...

These are sorted by the name of the database and Alexander Street Press' Name, so remember to browse by "Music Online," "American Song," "Classical Music Library," "Jazz Music Library," "Contemporary World Music," or "Smithsonian Global Sound."

Back to top

Browse by Music Databases

Alternatively, you can browse through the music databases if you do not remember the names of the databases.

...

...

...

Back to top

Search by Vendor

It is also possible to find the Alexander Street Press Databases by searching by Vendor...

...

...

Back to top

Search by Audio Resources

The last way of finding the music resources is by searching "Audio Resources" which is under the "Subject Category" in Research Port.

...

By doing this search, you will also find other audio resources besides the ASP ones!

Back to top

  • Music Online
    This is a database that brings together all the Alexander Street Press resources that relate to music.
  • American Song
    This is an audio database of American Songs.
  • Classical Music Library
    This is an audio database of Classical Music.
  • Contemporary World Music
    This is a audio database of Contemporary World Music.
  • Jazz Music Library
    This is an audio database of Jazz Music.
  • Smithsonian Global Sound
    This is an audio database of Folk Music.
